attributes.action: Make Cumbria zoo close its doors for good
attributes.background: Cumbria zoo in the uk has seen 500 hundred animals die due to negligence in the past four years .They have been denied a licence but we need to make sure that this zoo is closed permanently. .please sign and share

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament are not responsible for the issue that you raise. Local councils are responsible for issuing and revoking licences for zoo operators.

You may be interested to know that Barrow-in-Furness Borough Council has refused to grant the owner of South Lakes Safari Zoo a new licence - you can find out more here: http://www.barrowbc.gov.uk/news/south-lakes-safari-zoo-press-release/
